meanings.definition: Made or arranged a match between two people or things.
meanings.sent1: She matchmade her friends and they became best buddies.
meanings.sent2: The dating app matchmade hundreds of couples last year.
meanings.sent3: The cupid matchmade the lonely hearts at the Valentine's party.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in matchmaking matchmade even the most unlikely pairs.
meanings.sent5: The matchmaker matchmade with precision, uniting hearts far and wide.

meanings.definition: Formed a pair or set that complements each other.
meanings.sent1: The colors matchmade perfectly in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The shoes and bag matchmade her outfit beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The peanut butter and jelly matchmade in the sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The melody and lyrics matchmade to create a beautiful song.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the dish matchmade to create a delicious blend.
